Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class boost::detail::bp::block_ptr< T >

Deterministic memory manager of constant complexity.

Complete memory management utility on top of standard reference counting.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T>
void boost::detail::bp::block_ptr< T >::init ( block_base *  p  )  [inline, private]

Enlist & initialize pointee objects belonging to the same block_header . This initialization occurs when a pointee object is affected to the first pointer living on the stack it encounters.

Parameters:
p Pointee object to initialize.

template<typename T>
void boost::detail::bp::block_ptr< T >::release ( bool  d  )  [inline, private]

Release of the pointee object with or without destroying the entire block_header it belongs to.

Parameters:
d Destroy (true) or reuse (false) the block_header it is releasing.

Member Data Documentation

template<typename T>
intrusive_stack::node boost::detail::bp::block_ptr< T >::pn_ [private]

Tag used for enlisting a pointer on the heap to later share the block_header it belongs to.

template<typename T>
block_header* boost::detail::bp::block_ptr< T >::ps_ [private]

Pointer to the block_header node block_ptr<> belongs to.
